short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Search Google without being redirected to local search results.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Elevate your search experience with Search on Google US, a Chrome extension meticulously designed to connect you directly to Google's US-based search engine.. Whether you're conducting academic research, looking for specific information, or exploring topics of interest, Search on Google US integrates effortlessly into your daily browsing activities, promoting a more efficient and effective search process.

Key Features:
Direct Access to US Search Results: Directly connect to Google US to obtain search results focused on the US audience, bypassing regional biases for more accurate information.
Privacy-First Searching: Conduct your searches with enhanced privacy settings, minimizing data tracking and protecting your online activities.
